title: 396 officers & 8,110 other ranks of Army promoted on Victory Day
body_lines: A total of 396 Officers and 8,110 other ranks of the Army have been promoted to their respective next rank by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa in view of the 13th National War Heroes Commemoration Day (18 May).
The Army said the promotions were made on the recommendation of the Ministry of Defence and Chief of Defence Staff and Commander of the Army General Shavendra Silva.(DSB)
